1033080587886764044.text: As it stands, Jeff Sessions is doing his job when the only leaks are coming from those being investigated. While I share the President’s concerns about the Russia investigation and believe it should end, Jeff Sessions is recused from that.

1033080586993324032.text: A recent CNN news story mischaracterized my trust in Attorney General Jeff Sessions. He has my full trust and I think he's done an excellent job in de-politicizing the DOJ. 1019326183744442368.text: We must continue supporting our intelligence agencies as they protect us from those who would undermine our nation. Further, the 2016 election was not ultimately undermined.
